name: scrap.me
author: scrap.me

sections.description:
Get an advance contact form for your site and offer site wide deals with additional tools like Deal Bar, Popups, Inline Popups, Social Bar, Leave intent targeting. Before activating the plugin please register an account from http://scrap.me and insert the API key here.

Features

  1. Contact Form
  2. Deal bar
  3. Social Bar
  4. Inline and Side Popups
  5. Splash Image
  6. Advance Lead Routing to multiple users
sections.installation:
1. Upload scrapme.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on the scrap.me in admin menu and enter your Scrap.me API Key
sections.faq:
How to get the API key?

You can get the API key from https://scrap.me/. After registration go to settings page and get the WordPress API Key.

Do I need to register somewhere else too?

Yes, you need to register from https://scrap.me/. This plugin is an add-on of scrap.me services.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Added support for https.

1.1

  • Added shortcode scrapmelink for interactive hyperlinks.

1.0

  • Initial relase.
